languages.text: {n}Сверкнув визорами, зверь медленно разворачивается к выходу. Мгновение вы проводите на расстоянии метра от твари, способной перекусить человека пополам. Она шипит вам в лицо...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Сверкнув визорами, зверь медленно разворачивается к выходу. Мгновение вы проводите на расстоянии метра от твари, способной перекусить человека пополам. Она шипит вам в лицо...{/n}

languages.text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Сверкнув визорами, зверь медленно разворачивается к выходу. Мгновение вы проводите на расстоянии метра от твари, способной перекусить человека пополам. Она шипит вам в лицо...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to slowly turn toward the exit. For a brief moment, you are only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws can snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

{n}Suddenly animated, the lacerax gracefully squeezes past you. You find yourself standing a metre away from a beast whose jaws could snap a human in half. It hisses in your face... and scampers away, sparing the life of its rescuer.{/n}

{n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

{n}The lacerax squeezes through the unpowered door with far less grace than is usually observed in such creatures. You suddenly find yourself standing a metre away from a beast whose jaws can snap a human in half. It hisses in your face,{/n} "Thh... ahh... nnh... khsss..." {n}before scampering away.{/n}

{n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

{n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

{n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

{n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to slowly turn toward the exit. For a brief moment, you are only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws can snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

languages.text: {n}异虎的面甲开始闪烁，身体慢慢转向了入口的方向。你忽然注意到，这头巨兽离你仅有一米远，而它强壮的下颚足以把人咬成两截。它嘶嘶地朝你脸上喷了口气……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}异虎的面甲开始闪烁，身体慢慢转向了入口的方向。你忽然注意到，这头巨兽离你仅有一米远，而它强壮的下颚足以把人咬成两截。它嘶嘶地朝你脸上喷了口气……{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un destello de su visor, la bestia se vuelve lentamente hacia la salida. Durante un breve instante te hallas a un metro escaso de una monstruosidad cuyas mandíbulas podrían partirte en dos sin problema. La criatura te bufa a la cara...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Con un destello de su visor, la bestia se vuelve lentamente hacia la salida. Durante un breve instante te hallas a un metro escaso de una monstruosidad cuyas mandíbulas podrían partirte en dos sin problema. La criatura te bufa a la cara...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vizörleri parlayan hayvan, yavaşça çıkışa doğru dönüyor. Bir anda kendini, çeneleri bir insanı ikiye ayırabilecek bir hayvanın bir metre uzağında buluyorsun. Yüzüne tıslıyor...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vizörleri parlayan hayvan, yavaşça çıkışa doğru dönüyor. Bir anda kendini, çeneleri bir insanı ikiye ayırabilecek bir hayvanın bir metre uzağında buluyorsun. Yüzüne tıslıyor...{/n}

languages.text: {n}獣のバイザーが閃くと、それはゆっくりと出口の方へ向きを変え始める。一瞬のうちに、人間を真っ二つに噛み砕けるような顎を持つ怪物と、わずか1メートルの距離で対峙していることに気づいた。それはあなたの顔に向かってシューッと威嚇する声を発した…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}獣のバイザーが閃くと、それはゆっくりと出口の方へ向きを変え始める。一瞬のうちに、人間を真っ二つに噛み砕けるような顎を持つ怪物と、わずか1メートルの距離で対峙していることに気づいた。それはあなたの顔に向かってシューッと威嚇する声を発した…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans un éclat de ses visières, l'animal se tourne lentement vers la sortie. Pendant un bref instant, vous vous retrouvez à un mètre à peine d'un monstre qui pourrait vous couper en deux d'un simple coup de mâchoire. Il vous siffle au visage...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans un éclat de ses visières, l'animal se tourne lentement vers la sortie. Pendant un bref instant, vous vous retrouvez à un mètre à peine d'un monstre qui pourrait vous couper en deux d'un simple coup de mâchoire. Il vous siffle au visage...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mit einem Aufblitzen seiner Visoren dreht sich die Bestie langsam Richtung Ausgang. Für einen kurzen Moment bist du gerade einmal einen Meter von der Monstrosität entfernt, deren Kiefer eine Person zweiteilen könnten. Sie zischt dir ins Gesicht ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a flash of its visors, the beast begins to turn slowly toward the exit. For a brief moment, you find yourself only a metre away from a monstrosity whose jaws could snap a person in two. It hisses in your face...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mit einem Aufblitzen seiner Visoren dreht sich die Bestie langsam Richtung Ausgang. Für einen kurzen Moment bist du gerade einmal einen Meter von der Monstrosität entfernt, deren Kiefer eine Person zweiteilen könnten. Sie zischt dir ins Gesicht ...{/n}
